Congratulations! You have completed the game. You can always come back and challenge your friends

The object of the game is to guess the word before the character is hung.
Each time a correct letter is guessed from the word, the corresponding empty dashes will be filled, the player wins 1 point and continue playing.
The first player to guess the word wins 3 points and will be able to start guessing the next word.
If the letter doesn't belong to the word, another appendage will be added to the character and the player will loose his turn.
If the stick man is completed before the word is guessed, then the player will loose.
